imageToTextConverter.title: Image to Text Converter
imageToTextConverter.description: Use our picture to text converter to extract text from JPG or image files. Quickly extract text files by pasting or uploading photos.

whatIs.heading: What is an Image to Text Converter?
whatIs.contentone: This Online ImageOCR tool is an image to text converter. By this you can extract text and characters from Images and pictures. If you want to extract text from a photograph, try our image to text converter.
whatIs.contenttwo: If you have a scanned book in PDF format and want to make it searchable, our PDF to Word or Excel conversion service is good for that! For picture to text conversion you have to simply upload the file and convert the image to text. Our service extracts text from your photographs using modern image pre-processing algorithms and OCR technologies and saves it in any editable format.

howItWorks.heading: How Does Our Image to Text Converter Work?

steps.stepone: Drag and Drop or upload and paste your image using the **Upload file** button.
steps.steptwo: Then press the **Convert to Text** button.
steps.stepthree: Now, please have patience and let our converter automatically extract text from your Iamges.
steps.stepfour: In the next seconds, you can download your extracted text in .txt format or you can copy extracted text from images.

keyFeatures.heading: Key Features of the Image to Text Converter

features.descriptionone: This tool is available for free for everyone.
features.descriptiontwo: This picture to text converter supports multiple image file formats like JPG, PNG, JPEG, GIF, and WEBP.
features.descriptionthree: If you have low-quality images, don't worry. The picture text extractor can quickly extract text from fuzzy and low-resolution photographs. Images of books, handwritten works, and screenshots may be faint and difficult to read. However, our program can extract data from such photos with high accuracy.

benefits.heading: Benefits of the Image to Text Converter

benefits.descriptiondigione: Digitizing printed documents is one of the most impactful feature of Image to Text converter. This process involves converting physical documents, such as books, articles, and newspapers, into digital formats using image to text converter.
benefits.descriptiondigitwo: The first step in digitizing printed documents is scanning the physical document. This can be done using a standard scanner, a multifunction printer, or even a smartphone camera. The goal is to create a high-resolution image of the document.
benefits.descriptiondigithree: Once the document is scanned, the image file is processed by an Image to Text converter. JPG to text converter analyzes the text within the image, recognizing characters, words, and sentences. this converter can handle various fonts, sizes, and even handwritten text.The Image to text converter extracts the recognized text from the image and converts it into a digital format. This can be a plain text file.
benefits.descriptionheaone: Convert your medical records pictures into text by using image to text converter for easier access and management.
benefits.descriptionheatwo: Automatically reads and processes handwritten prescriptions images with image to text converter to reduce errors in medication dispensing.
benefits.descriptioned: This image to text converter converts scanned textbooks or historical documents into editable text files for students. It also accelerates grading by converting handwritten test responses into digital text.
benefits.descriptionleone: Convert legal documents, contracts, and agreements into searchable digital files.
benefits.descriptionletwo: Ensure compliance with regulations requiring digital record-keeping and accessibility through the image to text converter.
benefits.descriptiontr: When you encounter text in an unknown language, simply take a photo, paste it into our image to text converter, and then input the extracted data into a language translator.

items.questionone: What types of images can I convert PDF files into?
items.answerone: You can convert PDF files into image formats such as JPEG.
items.questiontwo: How many pages of a PDF can I convert to images at once?
items.answertwo: You can convert all pages of a PDF file into images simultaneously. The conversion process generates one image file per page.

items.questionone: What format is the Word document converted from a PDF file?
items.answerone: PDF files are converted into editable Word documents (.docx format).
items.questiontwo: Are images and formatting preserved during the PDF to Word conversion?
items.answertwo: Yes, images and most formatting elements (fonts, styles, tables, etc.) are preserved during the conversion process.
items.questionthree: Can password-protected PDF files be converted to Word documents?
items.answerthree: If you have the password to unlock the PDF file, you can convert password-protected PDFs to Word documents. Otherwise, the conversion may not be possible without the password.

items.questionone: What types of images can I convert to text?
items.answerone: You can convert various types of images containing text, such as JPEG, PNG, and GIF, into editable text files.
items.questiontwo: Does the quality and clarity of the image affect text recognition accuracy?
items.answertwo: Yes, higher quality and clearer images generally result in better text recognition accuracy. Images with noise or poor resolution may affect accuracy.
items.questionthree: Can handwritten text in images be converted to editable text?
items.answerthree: Handwritten text recognition depends on the clarity and legibility of the handwriting. Advanced OCR (Optical Character Recognition) software may support handwritten text recognition.

items.questionone: What format is the Excel file converted from a PDF?
items.answerone: PDF files are converted into Excel spreadsheets (.xlsx format). This allows you to manipulate and analyze data within Excel.
items.questiontwo: Are tables and formatting preserved during the PDF to Excel conversion?
items.answertwo: Yes, tables, data formatting, and most layout structures are preserved during the conversion process. Complex layouts may require manual adjustments.
items.questionthree: Can password-protected PDF files be converted to Excel spreadsheets?
items.answerthree: If you have the password to unlock the PDF file, you can convert password-protected PDFs to Excel spreadsheets. Otherwise, the conversion may not be possible without the password.

items.questionone: What types of images can I convert to PDF?
items.answerone: You can convert various types of images (JPEG, PNG, GIF, etc.) into PDF format.
items.answertwo: Yes, you can turn several photos into multiple PDF documents. There is one PDF for every image.

items.questionone: What format is the PDF file converted from a Word document?
items.answerone: Word documents (.docx and .doc format) are converted into PDF format. This conversion preserves the content and formatting of the original Word document.
items.questiontwo: Are images and formatting preserved during the Word to PDF conversion?
items.answertwo: Yes, images, fonts, styles, tables, and most formatting elements are preserved during the conversion process. Complex layouts may require adjustments.
items.questionthree: Can password-protected Word documents be converted to PDF?
items.answerthree: If you have the password to unlock the Word document, you can convert password-protected documents to PDF. Otherwise, the conversion may not be possible without the password.

metadata.title: FAQ
metadata.description: Frequently Asked queries page where you can find answers to all of your queries about converters

content.intro: The best tools for turning images into text, scanned PDFs, and Docx files into editable and searchable forms are offered by OnlineOCR.net. Our highly developed OCR software converts documents into a variety of file types, such as Excel, PDF, Docx, images, and text. We provide quick and accurate conversion as part of our service to save you time and eliminate the need for manual procedures.

sections.textone: Free online OCR service eliminates the need for manually entering documents, minimizing energy and time. Our service offers rapid and precise conversions for single and multi-page documents, increasing productivity.
sections.texttwo: This service supports 36 languages, covering both APAC and EMEA languages such as English, French, German, Italian, Portuguese, Russian, Spanish, Japanese, Chinese, Korean, and many more. We also handle documents written in multiple languages, ensuring comprehensive support for your needs.
sections.textthree: Take use of our free service forever. Discover why many individuals rely on OnlineOCR.net for their document conversion needs by using our convenient service.

The terms "Client", "You", and "Your" refer to the user who logs on and is compliant with the company's terms and conditions. "The Company", "Ourselves", "We", "Our" and "Us" refer to the company, while "Party", "Parties", or "Us" refers to both the client and ourselves.
termssection2.paragraph2: The terms are taken as interchangeable and are governed by the terms of use. By using imageocr.info, users agree to these terms and are legally bound by them. The company may modify these terms at its discretion, and users should periodically check the page for updates. If users do not agree to these terms, they should not use the website.

termssection3.paragraph1: imageocr.info is a website that offers services, but does not guarantee their accuracy or reliability. Users are advised to report any errors. The site may be changed without notice, and users are not responsible for any loss, change, or corruption of submitted content. The site does not guarantee problem-free operation or a virus-free server. If users need to repair or replace equipment or data, they are responsible for those costs.

The site may review, remove, or refuse to display it, but has no obligation to do so. imageocr.info does not endorse or take responsibility for content on third-party sites, so users should access it at their own risk. It is important to use discretion and proceed at your own risk.

termssection4.paragraph1: imageocr.info does not claim its services are suitable for any specific purpose or audience. The site is not responsible for any damages, claims, or injuries resulting from unlawful or inappropriate access.
termssection4.paragraph2: If any provision within the Terms of Use is invalid, the rest remains valid. imageocr.info choice not to enforce any provision does not waive its right to future enforcement. It is important to review the Terms of Use periodically for updates or changes. By continuing to use the site, users agree to be bound by the most current version of the Terms of Use.

termssection5.paragraph: We use cookies. By accessing imageocr.info, you agree to our use of cookies, as outlined in our Privacy Policy. metadata.title: Terms and Conditions
metadata.description: Conditions of use for our free converter tool.

introduction.paragraph1: Your use of the imageocr.info service is subject to your acceptance of our Terms and Conditions and this Privacy Policy.
introduction.paragraph2: At imageocr.info, accessible from imageocr.info, protecting the privacy of our visitors is one of our main priorities. This Privacy Policy document outlines the types of information collected and recorded by imageocr.info and explains how we use it.
introduction.paragraph3: If you have additional questions or require more information about our Privacy Policy, please do not hesitate to contact us.
introduction.paragraph4: This Privacy Policy becomes effective upon your first use of the service. By using imageocr.info, you acknowledge that you have read and understood the terms of this Privacy Policy and agree to be bound by them. If you do not agree with this Privacy Policy, please do not use imageocr.info or any materials and resources available on this service.

personalData.title: Personal Data
personalData.paragraph2: We do not view the files that you upload using the imageocr.info service. However, we may view your file's metadata (file extensions, sizes, etc., but not the content) to provide technical support.

cookies.title: Cookies
cookies.paragraph1: imageocr.info uses browser cookies to store state information about your activity on our site. Cookies help us keep track of your preferences and enhance your user experience. We do not store any of your personal information in cookies. Cookies are small data files written to your device’s hard drive. Cookies cannot read other data from your hard drive, pass on viruses, or read cookie files created by other sites. You can refuse cookies by turning them off in your browser settings, but note that some features of imageocr.info may not function properly without cookies enabled.

technicalInformation.title: Technical Information
technicalInformation.paragraph1: The technical details logged are confined to the following types of information:
technicalInformation.detail1: The Internet Protocol (IP) address or gateway of the visitor's web server.
technicalInformation.detail2: The type of web browser used by the visitor.
technicalInformation.detail3: The operating system of the visitor's device.
technicalInformation.detail4: The screen resolution of the visitor's monitor.
technicalInformation.detail5: Information on potential security risks, URLs of websites visited that we deem potentially fraudulent, and executable files identified as potential malware.
technicalInformation.detail6: Metadata regarding uploaded files such as file size, file name, file format, and other relevant parameters.

yourRights.title: 2. Your Rights
yourRights.paragraph1: Since imageocr.info is a free service that does not require user registration, we do not collect or store personal data for extended periods. Data that is uploaded to our service is only stored for a maximum of two hours before it is automatically deleted.

ccpaPrivacyRights.title: 3. CCPA Privacy Rights (Do Not Sell My Personal Information)
ccpaPrivacyRights.paragraph1: Under the California Consumer Privacy Act (CCPA), California consumers have the right to:
ccpaPrivacyRights.right1: Request that a business that collects a consumer's personal data disclose the categories and specific pieces of personal data that a business has collected about consumers.
ccpaPrivacyRights.right2: Request that a business delete any personal data about the consumer that a business has collected.
ccpaPrivacyRights.right3: Request that a business that sells a consumer's personal data not sell the consumer's personal data.
ccpaPrivacyRights.paragraph2: Since imageocr.info is a free service that does not require user registration and automatically deletes all uploaded data within two hours, the collection of personal data is minimal. If you still wish to exercise any of these rights, please contact us, and we will respond within one month.

gdprDataProtectionRights.title: 4. GDPR Data Protection Rights
gdprDataProtectionRights.paragraph1: We would like to make sure you are fully aware of all of your data protection rights. Every user is entitled to the following:
gdprDataProtectionRights.right1: The right to access – You have the right to request copies of your personal data. Since we only store uploaded data for two hours and do not require login, the personal data we can provide is very limited.
gdprDataProtectionRights.right2: The right to rectification – You have the right to request that we correct any information you believe is inaccurate. Given the temporary nature of our data storage, most rectifications will be unnecessary.
gdprDataProtectionRights.right3: The right to erasure – You have the right to request that we erase your personal data, under certain conditions. Since all data is automatically erased after two hours, this right is inherently respected.
gdprDataProtectionRights.right4: The right to restrict processing – You have the right to request that we restrict the processing of your personal data, under certain conditions. However, our data processing is minimal and short-term.
gdprDataProtectionRights.right5: The right to object to processing – You have the right to object to our processing of your personal data, under certain conditions. If you have concerns, please contact us immediately.
gdprDataProtectionRights.right6: The right to data portability – You have the right to request that we transfer the data that we have collected to another organization, or directly to you, under certain conditions. Since we store data only for two hours and do not collect personal information, this right is generally not applicable.
gdprDataProtectionRights.paragraph2: If you make a request, we have one month to respond to you. If you would like to exercise any of these rights, please contact us.

locationOfDataProcessing.title: 5. Location of Data Processing and Storage
locationOfDataProcessing.paragraph1: The data you upload to imageocr.info may be processed and stored on servers located in various countries where imageocr.info operates. Given the temporary nature of our service, all data is automatically deleted within two hours of upload.
locationOfDataProcessing.paragraph2: By using imageocr.info, you consent to the temporary storage and processing of your data in these locations. We ensure that all data processing is conducted in accordance with applicable privacy laws, and all data is securely deleted after the two-hour retention period.

changesToPolicy.title: 6. Changes to This Privacy Policy
changesToPolicy.paragraph1: This Privacy Policy may be updated periodically. Any changes, updates, or modifications will be effective immediately upon posting on our site. We encourage you to review this Privacy Policy regularly to stay informed about our data practices.

thirdPartyAdvertising.title: 7. Third-Party Advertising
thirdPartyAdvertising.paragraph1: We may display third-party advertisements on imageocr.info. These third-party advertisers may use cookies and similar technologies to collect information about your activities on our site and other websites to provide you with targeted advertising based on your interests. We do not share any personal information with these third-party advertisers. You can manage your preferences regarding targeted advertising through your browser settings.

metadata.title: Privacy and Policy
metadata.description: This page outlines our policies on privacy.
